message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm not willing to go above $9000. I'd love to get this product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $10500. Is that something you'd be comfortable with?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider $9800?

I see you're trying to squeeze out a bit more, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of a price of $10000. This is my final offer on this price point, but I'm willing to consider a bit more if you're willing to meet me at the midpoint.
